name: Virtual Security Chief Dad
description:
The life of a Security Chief virtual dad is far demanding than Virtual mom as you Don’t let your family down! Experience the Duty of virtual daddy chief security officer and Perform Multi-tasks from Being the guardian of celebrity life to take care of your family. Give proper protocol to President and cover the royal wedding ceremony with great care at new family fun. Get thrilled with unexpected surprise events at Virtual Security Chief Dad. Make this virtual family game much more difficult with the completion of every task given to Ultimate Family Man.

Are you excited to play as virtual daddy? You might have experienced many virtual mom happy familia life. Now, time to get rid of all virtual mother ultimate family woman and get started to Virtual Security Chief Dad. This super family man takes care of all tough tasks and even work as kitchen helper and care taker of the house. Moreover, The Super dad has tough duty of security head office from which he has to perform different tasks. Steer around L.a city to play whos your daddy? Fulfill your Task And be a boss of the house in this virtual dad simulator. Remember your goal is to play like ultimate family man and increases the variety and difficulty of tasks in this family life simulator.

Virtual Security Chief Dad unfolds the virtual life story of VIP chief security officer. The virtual father has to Perform multiple Security Officer Task and earn points to Upgrade super family life simulator. Provide proper protocol to President and Receive him from different location like Meeting, airport. Being an officer you have to steer Wedding limousine simulator to pick and drop celebrity bride at their royal wedding with great safety security. Call your security team and make them prepare to steer Wedding limo car around city streets & reach Marriage Hall to drop couple safely at red carpet. Don’t forget that you are Ultimate Family Man too who spends quality time with his virtual family fun.

Download Virtual Security Chief Dad and enjoy reliving virtual dad family simulator and perform Multi-task to get it all done under the limited time to spend more time with happily family!

Game features:

» Addictive virtual mom adventures
» High Quality 3D Graphics
» Immersive Sounds like virtual highschool boy
» Addictive virtual dad family simulator
» Exciting security officer task
» Smooth and Easy Controls
» Super Cool virtual house environment
» Realistic Dad Simulator happy Life
